name: Gravity (itch) (zsoker)
description:
Your job is to transport goods with your spaceship from one asteroid to another. The goods have different weights, which makes it sometimes tricky to navigate your spaceship. Save on fuel and avoid collisions. They can be expensive and decimate your pay. Use gravity instead of fuel to increase your profit.

It is a kind of addictive and meditative game with retro arcade style. Graphics, sound effects and music are self made.

Usage:

  • <UP> key to accelerate spaceship
  • <LEFT> and <RIGHT> keys to turn the spaceship
  • <SPACE> key to start the game 
  • <ESC> key to pause the game
  • <Q> key to go back to start screen from the pause
  • <ESC> to quit the game from the start screen
